name: Wart's Turn-Based Revenge
summary: What if Mario 2 was a turn-based strategy game? Well now you don't have to wonder. Give it a shot! Control Mario, Peach, Toad and the Green one. Find advantageous cover and attack the enemies! Stop on a plant to automatically toss it an an enemy for extra damage. Fight through 23 levels with 5 boss fights! Completing all levels takes 2-3 hours. 3 different level completion modes are available: Defeat All, Reach Area, and Defeat Boss. Saving is only supported in the downloadable version.
